trait.name: Natural Armor
trait.text: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren’t wearing armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield’s benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

trait.name: Observant & Athletic
trait.text: You have proficiency in the Athletics and Perception skills.

trait.name: Leviathan Will
trait.text: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
trait.text: You can breathe air and water, but you need to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Speed
trait.text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet, and you have a swim speed of 30 feet.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Aquan and Common.
